bug.author: chinakook
bug.summary: Cmake option USE_OPERATOR_TUNING on Windows BUG
bug.description: When I build mxnet on Windows with the CMake option USE_OPERATOR_TUNING checked, MXNet cannot be successfully imported by python and the libmxnet.dll cannot be successfully loaded by any C++ programs. However, turning USE_OPERATOR_TUNING off can solve this issue.

comments.comment: same problem. mxnet can be built successfully when enable USE_OPERATOR_TUNING, but It just hung up when running script , never execute it. turn it off and rebuild it, mxnet works normally.
It's fixed in the newest mxnet.
